name: articles
description: This is a repo that contains basic text files for writing projects I am doing that do not require coding or graphics.

name: bayesian_loss_curves
description: This repo contains all the code and data for the research I have done into working on the Bayesian hierarchical model on loss curves.

name: bdaworkshop2013
description: This is the data, the code and assorted files that were used in conjunction with a series of workshops on Bayesian Data Analysis given by myself for Dublin R over the summer/autumn of 2013. All feedback and corrections are welcome.

name: blas_graph_benchmark
description: This repo contains all the work involved in benchmarking BLAS with R and the use of graph models

name: bond_portfolio_cashflows
description: This repository is used to update some old code I wrote to automatically model cashflows from a bond portfolio.

name: carinsurance_pricing
description: This repository illustrates some work in using GLMs to price car insurance based on car insurance policy and claim data. It also features some systematic data exploration and the use of MonteCarlo simulation to investigate the effectiveness of the pricing policies we are using.

name: collab_scratchwork
description: This is a simple repo used for throwaway style collaborations

name: coursera-dl
description: Script for downloading Coursera.org videos and naming them.

name: cran_graph_analysis
description: This repo contains the data preparation and exploration for some graph analysis of packages available from CRAN.

name: datadriven
description: Mostly analytics in insurance

name: datasciencecoursera
description: This is the github repo need for the Data Scientist's Toolbox course on coursera

name: datascience_competition
description: This repo contains code, information and data for various Data Science related competitions I run.

name: datasharing
description: The Leek group guide to data sharing

name: datatable
description: R package data.table extends data.frame.  Fast aggregation of large data, fast ordered joins, fast add/modify/delete of columns by reference by group using no copies at all, cells can contain vectors, chained queries and a fast file reader (fread). Offers a natural and flexible syntax, for faster development.

name: data_workshops
description: This repository contains all the files for the various workshops created as part of Dublin R

name: dds-soup2nuts
description: This repository contains the in-workshop code produced during the Dublin Data Science workshop on Data Science: Soup to Nuts

name: deshawk_tm
description: This is some experimentation with text mining using some documents written as part of a long-running DnD RPG campaign

name: docker_image
description: This repo contains the Dockerfiles and other scripts etc required to build all the Docker containers used for my work.

name: dublin_lg_code
description: This is a simple code repo for the various tasks et al. we are sharing as part of a small, informal learning group in Dublin.

name: eve.industry
description: ProjectTemplate structure for calculating the various Eve Online industry tools

name: evecalc
description: R Package for Eve online calculations using data from the static data dump

name: example-models
description: Example models for Stan

name: explore_bayesian_survival
description: This is a purely speculative repo that contains the work I am doing to help build survival models in a Bayesian context.

name: illustration_project
description: This is a demo repo to show workflow

name: insurance-modelling
description: This repo is used to build some insurance related models as a collaboration between Mick Cooney and Cynon Sonkkila

name: insurance_portfolio_work
description: In this repo, we provide data and workbooks for portfolio optimisation and allocation for a book of insurance business.

name: intro_bayes
description: This is some code I use to introduce Bayesian data analysis and Bayesian concepts to people

name: intro_functional_programming_r
description: This repo contains the workbooks, code and data used as part of the "Introduction to Functional Programming in R"

name: intro_options
description: This repo contains the main workbooks for my Introduction to Options blog posts that I wrote while I was at Applied AI:

name: irish_census_clustering
description: This work takes the 2011 Irish census data and performs some basic data exploration and clustering on the small area maps.

name: KidsFoodandFacebook
description: Psychology Research Study examining Young Adolescents and Food Advertising on Facebook

name: lifeinsurance_exploration_lapse
description: In this repo we perform some basic exploratory data analysis of a book of life insurance data and investigate lapse.

name: manufacturing_hedging
description: This is work done to help with hedging prices for industries where the inputs and outputs prices are correlated with currency moves.

name: masterclass_exploration
description: This GItHub repo contains files and data for the Data Science Masterclass workshop on Data Exploration.

name: option_margin_calculator
description: This repo contains the details for the option margin calculator work based on a book of Canadian options.

name: Podcasts
description: This repository is a collection of podcasts collated.

name: readxl
description: Read excel files (.xls and .xlsx) into R

name: rocket_launches
description: This repository contains some simple scraping logic to allow me to look at rocket launch data.

name: stan-dev.github.io
description: Stan website based on the So Simple Jekyll theme.

name: stancasestudy_losscurves
description: This repository holds the code and stan files for the creation of an example Stan case study on modelling loss curves in Insurance.

name: stats_learning
description: This repo contains workbooks, data and other resources used for learning and collaborating with other people.

name: stats_through_simulation
description: In this repo, we have a simple workbook that illustrates the basic concepts of statistics like the Law of Large Numbers and the Central Limit Theorem via simulation.

name: subpop_comparison
description: This repo contains the workbooks and data files for comparing a subpopulation in a dataset.

name: survival_dashboard
description: A short demonstration project to show how we can use the outputs of a survival model in a dashboard to help with visualisation and model explanation.

name: sysadmin_files
description: This files contains a bunch of random files, configs and so on for my various sysadmin work

name: talk_r_insurance_201707
description: This repository contains the code and output for my 2017 talk at R in Insurance.

name: terrorism_analysis
description: This repo contains the workshops and materials used in the terrorism analysis performed on the GTD.

name: training_courses
description: This is a repository I will use for the creation of any training courses I decide to run

name: tsworkshop2013
description: Files, data and sample code for the 2013 Dublin R series of workshops on time series analysis

name: tts_games_mod
description: This repo contains the scripting code to set up games of Ora & Labora on the Tabletop Simulator mod.
